attributes.action: change the law to introduce a 'three strikes and you are out' policy to ensure proper custodial sentencing for habitual criminals.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Habitual criminals in this country are laughing at our judicial system.  We need a system whereby anybody convicted a third time for any similar crime - burglary; theft; causing death by driving etc - receives an AUTOMATIC MANDATORY LIFE MEANS LIFE custodial sentence with no opportunity for remission or early release.
